1. Wake-up light
2. LIGHTIFY Switch

1. Dynamic Scenes: Preset Scenes with predefined color-changing settings to create a perfect mood in your home. You can find it under the presets.
2. Vacation Mode: The Vacation Mode will switch the chosen devices or groups in a defined timeframe while you are away to simulate your presence. You can find it in features.
3. Soft on/off: Let your lights slowly fade or soft on/off when you switch them. Find it in basic settings.
4. Additional Bug Fixes.

1. Rate the App: Give us your valuable feedback now and rate the LIGHTIFY app.
2. TV Simulation: TV simulation allows you to create timer on your devices and groups.
3. Further Improvements: A better design, useful help settings as well as features improve your lighting control.

LIGHTIFY Motion Sensor: Discover the LIGHTIFY motion sensor for your home. Enjoy even more freedom and flexibility as your light will now follow you and your movements.

• Redesign of the widget configuration screen.
• Improved gateway status information.
• Additional Bug fixes.

• Dynamic Scenes update for good night light: Starts at current brightness level.
• Delete user account: You can delete your LIGHTIFY user Account from the app, if you face any issues with your account.
• LIGHTIFY Switch Mini: Control your devices with the LIGHTIFY Switch mini. No need to pull out your mobile device for controlling your system.
• Improved Wakeup Light: Prolong or shorten the sunrise time per your needs.

• Additional Bug fixes
• Corridor mode for motion sensor

New LIGHTIFY App-Design:
We have made the app more intuitive and enjoyable for you. From now on, you can sort your devices and search for it. Furthermore, you can add shortcuts of your favorite devices/groups/moods and organizers on our new home dashboard to access them easily.
Various bug fixes and stability improvements.

• Custom Dynamic Moods
